definition: deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate

sentences.english: People given a suspended death penalty typically have the sentence commuted.
sentences.chinese: 被判死緩的人通常會獲得減刑。

sentences.english: Must control the application of the death penalty with reprieve from the procedure and substantiality.
sentences.chinese: 必須從程序和實體兩方面對死緩制度的適用進行控制。

sentences.english: If she shows good behavior, her sentence will be commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 如果表現良好，她的死緩將被減成無期徒刑。

sentences.english: In the aspect of procedure, the law should definitely prescribe the term of sanction of reprieve.
sentences.chinese: 在程序方面提出，要明確規定死緩案件覈准的期限。
